definition: dissociation/to break up a chemical compound into its elements
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

pinyin: jie3 li2 xing4 ren2 ge2 ji2 huan4

sentences.english: Thus, the spell disintegrates only part of any very large object or structure targeted.
sentences.chinese: 因此，此法術只能解離龐大物體或結構的一部分。

sentences.english: The oxyhemoglobin dissociation curve shifts to the right, making more oxygen available at the tissues.
sentences.chinese: 氧解離曲線右移能使組織獲得更多的氧。

sentences.english: The un-ionized form is usually lipid soluble and diffuses readily across cell membranes.
sentences.chinese: 非解離型部分通常爲脂溶性，很容易透過細胞膜擴散。

sentences.english: Ly-GDI is the lymphoid-specific guanosine diphosphate (GDP) dissociation inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: GDI爲淋巴細胞特異的鳥苷酸去磷酸化解離抑制劑。

sentences.english: Therefore, dissociation of tetrachloromethane ionization process has been subject to attention.
sentences.chinese: 所以四氯甲烷的解離電離過程一直都受到人們的重視。

sentences.english: " Report " of the disintegration of micro-and macro-acid, glycyl fixed.
sentences.chinese: 測定微觀和宏觀甘氨酰酸解離常數。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo determine the first and second dissociation constants of puerarin.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定葛根素的解離常數。

sentences.english: Under appropriate conditions, hemoglobin dissociates into its four subunits.
sentences.chinese: 在合適的條件下，血紅蛋白解離成四個亞基。

sentences.english: Thus, drug penetration may be attributed mostly to the un-ionized form.
sentences.chinese: 因此，藥物穿透主要是由非解離型來完成的。

sentences.english: Second, aimed at the ionization and dissociation mass spectrum of trimethylamine.
sentences.chinese: 針對三甲胺的電離解離質譜。

sentences.english: Beholders usually carve out underground lairs for themselves using their disintegrate rays.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔經常用它們的解離射線雕刻自己的地底巢穴。

sentences.english: It is the first time that the histological characteristics of peel dissociation of the above two kinds of herbs are identified.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次提供了二種白豆蔻的果皮解離組織特徵。

definition: loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
